sen.j: 直勝の曾孫である当時の掛川藩主・井伊直朝が精神病だったために改易となった。
sen.e: The great-grandchild of Naokatsu and the lord of Kakegawa Domain in Totomi Province during this period, Naotomo II, had a mental illness; this resulted in the Ii familys' Kaieki (forfeiture in rank of Samurai and properties).

sen.e: The Ii Hyobushoyu family adopted Naonori II, the fourth son of Naooki II from Ii Kamonnokami family; the Ii Hyobushoyu family was permitted to keep, restore and continue the family name.
